title: The Happy Little Elves
description: The elves of Elfland want you to come along for an adventure. Join Moldy, Brainy, Bubbles, Cheery, Yendor, Doofy, and the whole gang!
quote: Remember, in the whole world there’s nobody like you. You’re special.
altHero: two male elves and one female elf stand in an elf house with big smiles and arms open wide
alt1: a young and old elf talk in the snow
alt2: a graduating elf is lifted in the air by two other elves
alt3: elves use a ladder to climb into a big jar of honey
alt4: an elf rides a bear-like animal
